meanings.definition: To make a copy of a document or image using a photocopier.
meanings.sent1: She is photocopying important papers for the meeting.
meanings.sent2: I need to start photocopying these notes for the class.
meanings.sent3: The office party was so wild that they ended up photocopying their faces.
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a photocopying machine, replicating every detail perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the photocopier photocopying echoed through the hallway.

meanings.definition: The act of producing a duplicate of a document or image using a photocopier.
meanings.sent1: The photocopying of the contract will be done by the secretary.
meanings.sent2: There was a long line at the photocopying machine in the library.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over the stack of photocopying, creating a mess.
meanings.sent4: The photocopying of the painting gave the artist a chance to experiment with colors.
meanings.sent5: The photocopying revealed hidden details in the old map.
